title: Pro cancels a booked shift within the allowed cancellation window
preconditions: Pro account is active with at least one future shift booked more than 24 hours before start time (cancellation allowed).

steps.step_text: Open the Instawork Pro app and navigate to the "My Shifts" tab (or Upcoming tab).
steps.step_expected: List of upcoming booked shifts is displayed.

steps.step_text: Tap the booked shift that starts more than 24 hours from now.
steps.step_expected: Gig detail screen opens showing shift information and a "Cancel shift" button.
Cancellation reason modal appears with "Yes, cancel shift" confirmation CTA.

steps.step_text: Select a cancellation reason (e.g., "Personal reasons") and tap "Yes, cancel shift".
steps.step_expected: Confirmation toast "Shift cancelled" appears and user is redirected back to My Shifts list.

steps.step_text: Verify the cancelled shift no longer appears under Upcoming shifts.
steps.step_expected: Shift is removed from Upcoming list and appears under Past/Cancelled section with status "Cancelled".

steps.step_text: Check account reliability metrics (optional analytics debug or UI).
steps.step_expected: Reliability metrics update appropriately; no reliability penalty is assessed because cancellation occurred within allowed window.
